text: David Russell Lee (born 18 June 1964) is an English DJ and music producer. He was formerly known by the stage name Joey Negro, which he retired in July 2020 following the George Floyd protests. He has released music under a variety of pseudonyms, including Jakatta, Doug Willis, Raven Maize, and Sessomatto. He was also apart of the Sunburst Band. Lee has scored a couple of top 40 hits, among them "American Dream", "So Lonely" and "My Vision". Category:1964 births Category:Living people
title: Dave Lee (DJ)
